summary: Title says it all, simply adds the same 20% shout timing enchantment to Greybeard Robes (Robes, Hood, and Boots.) While simultaneously making the robes playable and adding a set, along with an Amulet of Talos, on a dresser on the far side wardrobe of one of the Living Halls.
descriptionHtml:
Title says it all, simply adds the same 20% shout timing enchantment to Greybeard Robes (Robes, Hood, and Boots.) While simultaneously making the robes playable and adding a set, along with an Amulet of Talos, on a dresser on the far side wardrobe of one of the Living Halls.

NOTE: It only says stolen in the screenshots because before the default ownership of the robes and amulet were the Greybeards, I changed it after the screenshots to player owned, so there\'s no penalty for taking them.
[line]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4673477][img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-s2qNEDCn4mo/UNzj-pNYEAI/AAAAAAAAAo4/m34KKqctedk/s800/dmcline.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: dmcthunder999
